titleStmt.title: The French kinges declaration and confirmation of the Proclamation of Nantes by His M[ajes]tie granted to those of the pretended reformed religion / faythfully translated out of the coppie printed at Paris by Francis du Carroy and Thomas Menard 1613, by J.B.
Declaration du roy et confirmation des Edits de Nantes. English. 1613
titleStmt.author: France. Sovereign (1610-1643 : Louis XIII)
Louis XIII, King of France, 1601-1643.
Barnes, John, d. 1618.

publicationStmt.publisher: For Iohn Barnes, and are to be sold at his shop neere Holborne Conduit,

notesStmt.note: Translation of Declaration du roy et confirmation des Edits de Nantes.
Imperfect: tightly bound, with print show-through.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
